revised_title: The Earth's Magnetic Force at Bombay: Observations and Variations
tldr: The author presents a study of the Earth's magnetic force at Bombay, analyzing the absolute direction, intensity, and variations in dip and declination from 1867 to 1874. The findings reveal an annual variation in dip and a steady increase in dip over time, with a probable error in weekly determinations. The study also discusses the impact of the annual variation of the diurnal inequality of dip and the changes in observation location.
